snippet: Prices fell initially on Monday, but reversed at midmorning to accelerate into the close, extending gains beyond the 20 percent mark that often signals a bull market.
abstract: Oil futures climb more than 8 percent; crude oil prices have soared more than $10 a barrel in three days, partly due to downward revision of United States production.
lead_paragraph: Prices fell initially on Monday, but reversed at midmorning to accelerate into the close, extending gains beyond the 20 percent mark that often signals a bull market.

headline.main: Oil Futures Rise 8% in 3rd Gain in a Row
headline.print_headline: Oil Futures Rise 8% in 3rd Gain in a Row

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
